in-human-participants-the-diet.body: The diet modulates memory and mood in the same direction as it modulates neurogenesis.

sources.title: Oxford Academic
sources.text: "... emerging studies bridging the gap between nutrition and mental health have resolutely established that learning and memory abilities as well as mood can be influenced by diet."

sources.title: Title 2
